TEXT: Please call Stella.  Ask her to bring these things with her from the store:  Six spoons of fresh snow peas, five thick slabs of blue cheese, and maybe a snack for her brother Bob.  We also need a small plastic snake and a big toy frog for the kids.  She can scoop these things into three red bags, and we will go meet her Wednesday at the train station.

TRANSCRIPTION: p l iː z k ɔː s t ɛ l ɚ æ s k ɜː s ə b ɹ ɪ ŋ ð ə t ɪ ŋ z w ɪ ð h ɚ f ɹ ʌ m ð ə s t ɔː s ɪ k s p ʊ n z ʌ v f ɹ ɛ ʃ n p eɪ z f aɪ v θ ɪ k s s s l æ v z ʌ v b l uː tʃ eɪ z æ n d m eɪ b i ɐ s n æ k f ɔːɹ h ɚ b ɹ oʊ ɾ ɚ b æ uː ɔː l s oʊ n iː d ɐ s m ɔː l p l æ s t ɪ k s n eɪ k æ n d ɐ b ɪ ɡ tʃ ɔːɹ f ɹ l f ɔːɹ d ə k eɪ s ʃ iː k æ n s k uː b ð z θ ɪ ŋ ɪ n t uː d ð ɪ z ɹ ɛ d b æ ɡ z æ n d m iː w ɪ ɡ ɚ n iː d əl w uː w l ɡ oʊ m iː ɾ ɚ w ɛ n s t eɪ æ t ð ə t ɹ eɪ n s t eɪ ʃ ə n
